name: Torpedo Task-Force
description:
The classic Atari 2600 version of missile command under the sea 

War! The surface world is ready to destroy your underwater city with a barrage of torpedoes. You've been given command of Torpedo Task-Force, the city's final line of defense. Destroy the incoming projectiles with plasma torpedoes of your own your people.

Controls

Use WASD or the ARROW KEYS to move your crosshair across the screen.

Use SPACE BAR to fire a plasma torpedo. Keep in mind your torpedoes take some time to reach their destination, so use your limited shots accordingly!

Also compatible with Dual Shock 4 and Xbox gamepad. Use the Left control stick to move the crosshair and the South face button to fire.
